Package alien4cloud.utils.jackson

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConditionalAttributes  
    ConditionalEnabledHelper
    Utility to share the condition validation code between serializer and de-serializer.
    JSonMapEntryArrayDeSerializer
    Custom de serializer that de-serialize map from an array of MapEntry.
    JSonMapEntryArraySerializer
    Custom serializer that serialize map as an array of MapEntry.
    MapEntry<T,V>
    A map/set entry as a key/value object to be serialized as is.
    NotAnalyzedTextMapEntry  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ConditionalOnAttribute
    This attributes is used by Conditional Serializers and De-serializers to specify which attribute on the context must exists so the de-serializer is enabled.
